ageGroups.name: Infant
ageGroups.description: Children from birth to 12 months of age

ageGroups.name: Young Toddler
ageGroups.description: Children from 12 to 24 months of age

ageGroups.name: Older Toddler
ageGroups.description: Children from 24 to 36 months of age

ageGroups.name: Preschool
ageGroups.description: Children from 3 to 5 years of age

ageGroups.name: School Age
ageGroups.description: Children from 5 to 12 years of age

ratios.notes: Maximum 2 infants per caregiver in mixed-age groups
Toddlers must be in separate groups from infants when possible
May be combined with preschool age in mixed-age groups
Standard preschool ratio for 3-5 year olds
School age children may have higher ratios during school hours

staffQualifications.requiredEducation: Bachelor's Degree in Early Childhood Education or related field
staffQualifications.notes: Director must be on-site at least 50% of operating hours

staffQualifications.requiredEducation: Associate's Degree in Early Childhood Education or related field
staffQualifications.notes: Lead teachers must have primary responsibility for curriculum planning
Assistant teachers work under supervision of lead teacher
Aides must be at least 18 years old and work under direct supervision

safetyRequirements: Fenced outdoor play area with self-closing gates
Emergency exit plans posted in each room
First aid kit in each room and vehicle
Fire extinguishers accessible on each floor
Smoke detectors in all sleeping areas
Carbon monoxide detectors if gas appliances present
healthRequirements: Handwashing stations in each room with warm water
Daily cleaning and sanitizing of all surfaces
Illness exclusion policies posted and enforced
Medication administration training for designated staff
Food safety training for kitchen staff
Immunization records maintained for all children

metadata.notes: This ruleset reflects current WV childcare licensing requirements as of August 2025. Regular updates should be checked against official state sources.
